channel.title: Problem with Spawning Objects(PI)
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I have a problem with spawning object. It is visible in the server but when i click it, it doesnt show object id etc etc.. and if i use a case in ClickObject or ActionHandler i still can't do nothing with it.. Do i miss something?

item.title: Problem with Spawning Objects(PI)
item.dc:creator: @judotesterk judotesterk
item.description:
@judotesterk wrote:

Got it fixed. The problem was that i needed to put it in second click

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Spawning Objects(PI)
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Put this in your ClickObject class

if(c.playerRights >= 3 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourNameHere")) { Misc.println("objectId: "+c.objectId+" ObjectX: "+c.objectX+ " objectY: "+c.objectY+" Xoff: "+ (c.getX() - c.objectX)+" Yoff: "+ (c.getY() - c.objectY)); } else if (c.playerRights == 3) { c.sendMessage("objectId: " + c.objectId + " objectX: " + c.objectX + " objectY: " + c.objectY); }

somewhere after
case FIRST_CLICK, case SECOND_CLICK and so on

hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Spawning Objects(PI)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

The issue is clearly in your debugging, try printing the details as soon as the object data is read from the byte buffer.

Read full topic
